SELECT ai.*, dd.valueName flatformName, ac1.categoryName categoryLevel1Name, ac2.categoryName categoryLevel2Name, ac3.categoryName categoryLevel3Name, ddy.valueName statusName FROM app_info ai LEFT JOIN data_dictionary dd ON ai.flatformId=dd.valueId AND dd.typeCode='APP_FLATFORM' JOIN data_dictionary ddy ON ai.status=ddy.valueId AND ddy.typeCode='APP_STATUS' JOIN app_category ac1 ON ai.categoryLevel1=ac1.id JOIN app_category ac2 ON ai.categoryLevel2=ac2.id JOIN app_category ac3 ON ai.categoryLevel3=ac3.id
and ai.id=#{id}
SELECT * FROM backend_user WHERE userCode=#{userCode} AND userPassword=#{userPassword}
